interfaces.name: CountCollectAPI
interfaces.description: External API to collect count data from external systems

interfaces.name: CountCollectedEvent
interfaces.description: Internal event emitted when a count is successfully collected

interfaces.name: CountQueryAPI
interfaces.description: Integrated Count Query API for external systems

interfaces.name: CountReadAPI
interfaces.description: Internal API to read count data from storage with pagination support

interfaces.name: CountUIAPI
interfaces.description: UI-facing API providing HTMX fragments for count management

interfaces.name: CountManagementAPI
interfaces.description: Internal API for managing count source metadata and manual value adjustments

components.name: CountUIHandler
components.description: Handles UI-related requests by serving HTMX-compatible responses. Orchestrates data retrieval via CountReadAPI and updates via CountManagementAPI.

components.name: CountCollector
components.description: Receives count data via External API and emits internal events for processing. Provides a paginated query interface and a management interface for UI-driven changes.

components.name: CountStorage
components.description: Subscribes to CountCollectedEvent and persists data to storage. Provides paginated data access (limit, offset) and total count for efficient querying of large datasets (QR-04).

components.name: count-api-service
components.description: Microservice for count collection and query. Uses event-driven internal architecture for scalability.

components.name: CountCollectionSystem
components.description: System for collecting and managing external count metrics.
